1.0.name: wordpress/eventist
1.0.description:
Eventist helps You create and manage events on Your WordPress blog. It uses a widget to display events on sidebar, and able to display events and event details on a specified page selected by the user.

Major features: * Own widget to display events * Two types of display inside the widget and inside the event page * WP style user interface to manage events * Can create so called multi-day events * Events can be copied (duplicate)
